name: DBS - Protect the City
description:
DRAGON BALL SUPER - Protect the City

  • Goku Black puts his Zero-Human Plan into Motion ! Prevent him to destroy the cities !
  • Use Ki Blasts to send your opponent flying ! You can deflect his shots with yours and use the shape of the lands to make inpredictable moves!
  • Your enemy's Life Points are not always the same and so is the size of the cities ! Don't give your oppenent any frame to aim for citizens!

Controls

  • Move freely in the air simply following your pointer.
  • Left-Click to use regular Ki Blasts.
  • Hold Left-Click to use charged Ki Blasts.
  • Right-Click to use your Super Ki Blast - it's bigger and more powerful but it reduces your life span a little bit.

DISCLAIMER

This game is only an experimental project. It is not an official game or commercial product of any kind. DRAGON BALL, DRAGON BALL Z, DRAGON BALL GT & DRAGON BALL SUPER are the property of TOEI ANIMATION, SHUEISHA and BIRD STUDIO, alongside with their many publishers among the world. Please support the offical releases.

YonoPlay - 2018
